trans-unit.source: Get Job
trans-unit.target: Get Job

trans-unit.source: Get Job
trans-unit.target: Get Job

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Get Job</languageKeyword> operation gets information about an existing job from the Windows Azure Import/Export service.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Get Job</languageKeyword> operation gets information about an existing job from the Windows Azure Import/Export service.

trans-unit.source: Request
trans-unit.target: Request

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Get Job</languageKeyword> request may be constructed as follows.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Get Job</languageKeyword> request may be constructed as follows.

trans-unit.source: HTTPS is required.
trans-unit.target: HTTPS is required.

trans-unit.source: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;subscription-id%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with your subscription ID, <codeInline>%%amp;lt;storage-account-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of your storage account, and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;job-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of your import job or export job:
trans-unit.target: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;subscription-id%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with your subscription ID, <codeInline>%%amp;lt;storage-account-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of your storage account, and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;job-name%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the name of your import job or export job:

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: Method

trans-unit.source: Request URI
trans-unit.target: Request URI

trans-unit.source: GET|HEAD
trans-unit.target: GET|HEAD

trans-unit.source: URI Parameters
trans-unit.target: URI Parameters

trans-unit.source: The following additional parameters may be specified on the request URI.
trans-unit.target: The following additional parameters may be specified on the request URI.

trans-unit.source: Parameter
trans-unit.target: Parameter

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel>Optional.</embeddedLabel> Can be used to override the <codeInline>Accept</codeInline> request header.
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel>Optional.</embeddedLabel> Can be used to override the <codeInline>Accept</codeInline> request header.

trans-unit.source: See the <codeInline>Accept</codeInline> header for additional information.
trans-unit.target: See the <codeInline>Accept</codeInline> header for additional information.

trans-unit.source: The following is an example of the <codeInline>$format</codeInline> query parameter:
trans-unit.target: The following is an example of the <codeInline>$format</codeInline> query parameter:

trans-unit.source: Request Headers
trans-unit.target: Request Headers

trans-unit.source: The following table describes required and optional request headers.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes required and optional request headers.

trans-unit.source: Request Header
trans-unit.target: Request Header

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel>Optional.</embeddedLabel> If specified, it must be <codeInline>application/json</codeInline> (which specifies the JSON Light format).
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel>Optional.</embeddedLabel> If specified, it must be <codeInline>application/json</codeInline> (which specifies the JSON Light format).

trans-unit.source: Other values will result in response code 406 (<languageKeyword>Not Acceptable</languageKeyword>).
trans-unit.target: Other values will result in response code 406 (<languageKeyword>Not Acceptable</languageKeyword>).

trans-unit.source: One of the following parameters can also be included:
trans-unit.target: One of the following parameters can also be included:

trans-unit.source: The default parameter is <codeInline>odata=minimalmetadata</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: The default parameter is <codeInline>odata=minimalmetadata</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: The following is an example header:
trans-unit.target: The following is an example header:

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel>Optional.</embeddedLabel> Currently only the values <codeInline>en</codeInline> and <codeInline>en-us</codeInline> are supported.
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel>Optional.</embeddedLabel> Currently only the values <codeInline>en</codeInline> and <codeInline>en-us</codeInline> are supported.

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel>Optional.</embeddedLabel> If this header is specified, the value must be set to <codeInline>0</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel>Optional.</embeddedLabel> If this header is specified, the value must be set to <codeInline>0</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel>Optional.</embeddedLabel> If specified, the value should specify the date and time when the request is sent, in RFC 1123 format.
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel>Optional.</embeddedLabel> If specified, the value should specify the date and time when the request is sent, in RFC 1123 format.

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel>Required.</embeddedLabel> Specifies the service management version to use for this request.
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel>Required.</embeddedLabel> Specifies the service management version to use for this request.

trans-unit.source: The value of this header must be set to <codeInline>2014-05-01</codeInline> or <codeInline>2014-11-01</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: The value of this header must be set to <codeInline>2014-05-01</codeInline> or <codeInline>2014-11-01</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel>Optional.</embeddedLabel> A DateTime value.
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel>Optional.</embeddedLabel> A DateTime value.

trans-unit.source: Specify this header to perform the operation only if the resource has been modified since the specified time.
trans-unit.target: Specify this header to perform the operation only if the resource has been modified since the specified time.

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel>Optional.</embeddedLabel> A DateTime value.
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel>Optional.</embeddedLabel> A DateTime value.

trans-unit.source: Specify this header to perform the operation only if the resource has not been modified since the specified date/time.
trans-unit.target: Specify this header to perform the operation only if the resource has not been modified since the specified date/time.

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel>Optional.</embeddedLabel> An ETag value.
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel>Optional.</embeddedLabel> An ETag value.

trans-unit.source: Specify this header to perform the operation only if the resource's ETag matches the value specified.
trans-unit.target: Specify this header to perform the operation only if the resource's ETag matches the value specified.

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel>Optional.</embeddedLabel> An ETag value, or the wildcard character (*).
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel>Optional.</embeddedLabel> An ETag value, or the wildcard character (*).

trans-unit.source: Specify this header to perform the operation only if the resource's ETag does not match the value specified.
trans-unit.target: Specify this header to perform the operation only if the resource's ETag does not match the value specified.

trans-unit.source: Specify the wildcard character (*) to perform the operation only if the resource does not exist, and fail the operation if it does exist.
trans-unit.target: Specify the wildcard character (*) to perform the operation only if the resource does not exist, and fail the operation if it does exist.

trans-unit.source: Request Body
trans-unit.target: Request Body

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: None.

trans-unit.source: Response
trans-unit.target: Response

trans-unit.source: The response includes an HTTP status code, a set of response headers, and a response body in XML format.
trans-unit.target: The response includes an HTTP status code, a set of response headers, and a response body in XML format.

trans-unit.source: Status Code
trans-unit.target: Status Code

trans-unit.source: A successful operation returns status code 200 (OK).
trans-unit.target: A successful operation returns status code 200 (OK).

trans-unit.source: Response Headers
trans-unit.target: Response Headers

trans-unit.source: The response for this operation includes the following headers.
trans-unit.target: The response for this operation includes the following headers.

trans-unit.source: Response Header
trans-unit.target: Response Header

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: The value of this header will always be <codeInline>identity</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: The value of this header will always be <codeInline>identity</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: The length of the content returned in the response.
trans-unit.target: The length of the content returned in the response.

trans-unit.source: If the response body is chunked, this header is not included.
trans-unit.target: If the response body is chunked, this header is not included.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the format in which the results are returned.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the format in which the results are returned.

trans-unit.source: The value of this header will always be <codeInline>application/json</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: The value of this header will always be <codeInline>application/json</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: A UTC date/time value generated by the service that indicates the time at which the response was initiated.
trans-unit.target: A UTC date/time value generated by the service that indicates the time at which the response was initiated.

trans-unit.source: Contains a value that the client can use to perform conditional operations by using the <parameterReference>If-Match</parameterReference> or <parameterReference>If-None-Match</parameterReference> request headers.
trans-unit.target: Contains a value that the client can use to perform conditional operations by using the <parameterReference>If-Match</parameterReference> or <parameterReference>If-None-Match</parameterReference> request headers.

trans-unit.source: The date/time that the job was last modified.
trans-unit.target: The date/time that the job was last modified.

trans-unit.source: The date format follows RFC 1123.
trans-unit.target: The date format follows RFC 1123.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="d4f67d84-a51c-4ff7-8bd0-0ae206c9e3c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Representation of Date/Time Values in Headers</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="d4f67d84-a51c-4ff7-8bd0-0ae206c9e3c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Representation of Date/Time Values in Headers</link>.

trans-unit.source: A value that uniquely identifies a request made against the Import/Export service.
trans-unit.target: A value that uniquely identifies a request made against the Import/Export service.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the version of the Import/Export service used to execute the request.
trans-unit.target: Indicates the version of the Import/Export service used to execute the request.

trans-unit.source: Response Body
trans-unit.target: Response Body

trans-unit.source: The format of the response body is as follows:
trans-unit.target: The format of the response body is as follows:

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the elements of the response body.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the elements of the response body.

trans-unit.source: Element
trans-unit.target: Element

trans-unit.source: Type
trans-unit.target: Type

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: String
trans-unit.target: String

trans-unit.source: The name of the import or export job.
trans-unit.target: The name of the import or export job.

trans-unit.source: property
trans-unit.target: property

trans-unit.source: A list of properties for the job.
trans-unit.target: A list of properties for the job.

trans-unit.source: String
trans-unit.target: String

trans-unit.source: The location where this job is being processed.
trans-unit.target: The location where this job is being processed.

trans-unit.source: Note this may be different than the location of the storage account associated with the job.
trans-unit.target: Note this may be different than the location of the storage account associated with the job.

trans-unit.source: String
trans-unit.target: String

trans-unit.source: The type of job: import or export.
trans-unit.target: The type of job: import or export.

trans-unit.source: String
trans-unit.target: String

trans-unit.source: Human-readable name for the job.
trans-unit.target: Human-readable name for the job.

trans-unit.source: May contain Unicode characters, spaces, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: May contain Unicode characters, spaces, and so forth.

trans-unit.source: CDATA
trans-unit.target: CDATA

trans-unit.source: Human-readable description of the job.
trans-unit.target: Human-readable description of the job.

trans-unit.source: The description may be up to 1024 characters.
trans-unit.target: The description may be up to 1024 characters.

trans-unit.source: CDATA
trans-unit.target: CDATA

trans-unit.source: Metadata associated with the job.
trans-unit.target: Metadata associated with the job.

trans-unit.source: The metadata may be up to 1024 characters.
trans-unit.target: The metadata may be up to 1024 characters.

trans-unit.source: String
trans-unit.target: String

trans-unit.source: Current state of the job.
trans-unit.target: Current state of the job.

trans-unit.source: For detailed descriptions of job states, see <link xlink:href="22d7e5f0-94da-49b4-a1ac-dd4c14a423c2" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Retrieving State Information for a Job</link>.
trans-unit.target: For detailed descriptions of job states, see <link xlink:href="22d7e5f0-94da-49b4-a1ac-dd4c14a423c2" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Retrieving State Information for a Job</link>.

trans-unit.source: Boolean
trans-unit.target: Boolean

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a request has been submitted to cancel the job.
trans-unit.target: Indicates whether a request has been submitted to cancel the job.

trans-unit.source: Integer
trans-unit.target: Integer

trans-unit.source: Overall percentage completed for the job in terms of bytes uploaded or downloaded versus total bytes.
trans-unit.target: Overall percentage completed for the job in terms of bytes uploaded or downloaded versus total bytes.

trans-unit.source: property
trans-unit.target: property

trans-unit.source: Specifies the return address information for the job.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the return address information for the job.

trans-unit.source: String
trans-unit.target: String

trans-unit.source: Name of the recipient who will receive the import or export drives when they are returned.
trans-unit.target: Name of the recipient who will receive the import or export drives when they are returned.

trans-unit.source: String
trans-unit.target: String

trans-unit.source: Address of the recipient of the returned drives.
trans-unit.target: Address of the recipient of the returned drives.

trans-unit.source: String
trans-unit.target: String

trans-unit.source: Phone number of the recipient of the returned drives.
trans-unit.target: Phone number of the recipient of the returned drives.

trans-unit.source: String
trans-unit.target: String

trans-unit.source: Email address of the recipient of the returned drives.
trans-unit.target: Email address of the recipient of the returned drives.

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the return carrier and customer’s account with the carrier.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the return carrier and customer’s account with the carrier.

trans-unit.source: String
trans-unit.target: String

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: The carrier’s name.
trans-unit.target: The carrier’s name.

trans-unit.source: String
trans-unit.target: String

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: The customer’s account number with the carrier.
trans-unit.target: The customer’s account number with the carrier.

trans-unit.source: property
trans-unit.target: property

trans-unit.source: Contains information about the Windows Azure datacenter to which the drives should be shipped.
trans-unit.target: Contains information about the Windows Azure datacenter to which the drives should be shipped.

trans-unit.source: String
trans-unit.target: String

trans-unit.source: The name of the recipient at the datacenter.
trans-unit.target: The name of the recipient at the datacenter.

trans-unit.source: String
trans-unit.target: String

trans-unit.source: The address of the datacenter.
trans-unit.target: The address of the datacenter.

trans-unit.source: property
trans-unit.target: property

trans-unit.source: Contains information about the package being shipped by the customer to the Microsoft data center.
trans-unit.target: Contains information about the package being shipped by the customer to the Microsoft data center.

trans-unit.source: String
trans-unit.target: String

trans-unit.source: The name of the carrier that is used to ship the import or export drives.
trans-unit.target: The name of the carrier that is used to ship the import or export drives.

trans-unit.source: String
trans-unit.target: String

trans-unit.source: The tracking number of the package.
trans-unit.target: The tracking number of the package.

trans-unit.source: Integer
trans-unit.target: Integer

trans-unit.source: The number of drives included in the package.
trans-unit.target: The number of drives included in the package.

trans-unit.source: Date
trans-unit.target: Date

trans-unit.source: The date when the package is shipped.
trans-unit.target: The date when the package is shipped.

trans-unit.source: property
trans-unit.target: property

trans-unit.source: Contains information about the package being shipped from the Microsoft data center to the customer to return the drives.
trans-unit.target: Contains information about the package being shipped from the Microsoft data center to the customer to return the drives.

trans-unit.source: The format is the same as the <languageKeyword>DeliveryPackage</languageKeyword> property above.
trans-unit.target: The format is the same as the <languageKeyword>DeliveryPackage</languageKeyword> property above.

trans-unit.source: This property is not included if the drives have not yet been returned.
trans-unit.target: This property is not included if the drives have not yet been returned.

trans-unit.source: String
trans-unit.target: String

trans-unit.source: The container or virtual directory to which the copy logs and backups of drive manifest files (if enabled) will be stored.
trans-unit.target: The container or virtual directory to which the copy logs and backups of drive manifest files (if enabled) will be stored.

trans-unit.source: If the job specifies a storage account key for authentication, then this path will refer to a container name.
trans-unit.target: If the job specifies a storage account key for authentication, then this path will refer to a container name.

trans-unit.source: If the job specifies a container SAS (shared access signature), then this path will refer to a virtual directory beneath the container named in the shared access signature.
trans-unit.target: If the job specifies a container SAS (shared access signature), then this path will refer to a virtual directory beneath the container named in the shared access signature.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="38cc16bd-ad55-4625-9a85-e1726c35fd1b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Import/Export Service Log File Format</link> for details.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="38cc16bd-ad55-4625-9a85-e1726c35fd1b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Import/Export Service Log File Format</link> for details.

trans-unit.source: Note that in REST version 2014-05-01, this element is called <languageKeyword>ImportExportStatesContainer</languageKeyword> and its value must be a container name.
trans-unit.target: Note that in REST version 2014-05-01, this element is called <languageKeyword>ImportExportStatesContainer</languageKeyword> and its value must be a container name.

trans-unit.source: Boolean
trans-unit.target: Boolean

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="2f703ff1-d52b-43bd-81ec-90350a39e2af" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Put Job</link> for a detailed description.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="2f703ff1-d52b-43bd-81ec-90350a39e2af" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Put Job</link> for a detailed description.

trans-unit.source: Boolean
trans-unit.target: Boolean

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="2f703ff1-d52b-43bd-81ec-90350a39e2af" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Put Job</link> for a detailed description.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="2f703ff1-d52b-43bd-81ec-90350a39e2af" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Put Job</link> for a detailed description.

trans-unit.source: String
trans-unit.target: String

trans-unit.source: A blob path that points to a block blob containing a list of blob names that were not exported due to insufficient drive space.
trans-unit.target: A blob path that points to a block blob containing a list of blob names that were not exported due to insufficient drive space.

trans-unit.source: If all blobs were exported successfully, then this element is not included in the response.
trans-unit.target: If all blobs were exported successfully, then this element is not included in the response.

trans-unit.source: Applies only to export jobs.
trans-unit.target: Applies only to export jobs.

trans-unit.source: The blob containing the list is stored in the container specified by the <languageKeyword>ImportExportStatesPath</languageKeyword> element, using the following naming convention: <codeInline>waies/jobname_timestamp_incomplete-blobs.xml</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: The blob containing the list is stored in the container specified by the <languageKeyword>ImportExportStatesPath</languageKeyword> element, using the following naming convention: <codeInline>waies/jobname_timestamp_incomplete-blobs.xml</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: property
trans-unit.target: property

trans-unit.source: Contains information about a set of drives.
trans-unit.target: Contains information about a set of drives.

trans-unit.source: This element is not included in the response if there are no drives associated with the job, for example, if the job is a newly created export job for which the drives have not yet been received.
trans-unit.target: This element is not included in the response if there are no drives associated with the job, for example, if the job is a newly created export job for which the drives have not yet been received.

trans-unit.source: property
trans-unit.target: property

trans-unit.source: Contains information about a drive.
trans-unit.target: Contains information about a drive.

trans-unit.source: String
trans-unit.target: String

trans-unit.source: The drive's hardware serial number, stripped of spaces.
trans-unit.target: The drive's hardware serial number, stripped of spaces.

trans-unit.source: String
trans-unit.target: String

trans-unit.source: The BitLocker key used to encrypt the drive.
trans-unit.target: The BitLocker key used to encrypt the drive.

trans-unit.source: For export drives, this field is only returned when the drive has been shipped back.
trans-unit.target: For export drives, this field is only returned when the drive has been shipped back.

trans-unit.source: String
trans-unit.target: String

trans-unit.source: The relative path of the manifest file on the drive.
trans-unit.target: The relative path of the manifest file on the drive.

trans-unit.source: The relative path is a fully qualified DOS path, without the drive letter.
trans-unit.target: The relative path is a fully qualified DOS path, without the drive letter.

trans-unit.source: String
trans-unit.target: String

trans-unit.source: The Base16-encoded MD5 hash of the manifest file on the drive.
trans-unit.target: The Base16-encoded MD5 hash of the manifest file on the drive.

trans-unit.source: String
trans-unit.target: String

trans-unit.source: The drive's current state.
trans-unit.target: The drive's current state.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="22d7e5f0-94da-49b4-a1ac-dd4c14a423c2" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Retrieving State Information for a Job</link> for detailed information about drive states.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="22d7e5f0-94da-49b4-a1ac-dd4c14a423c2" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Retrieving State Information for a Job</link> for detailed information about drive states.

trans-unit.source: String
trans-unit.target: String

trans-unit.source: Detailed status about the data transfer process.
trans-unit.target: Detailed status about the data transfer process.

trans-unit.source: This field is not returned in the response until the drive is in the <languageKeyword>Transferring</languageKeyword> state.
trans-unit.target: This field is not returned in the response until the drive is in the <languageKeyword>Transferring</languageKeyword> state.

trans-unit.source: The value of this field can be one of the below:
trans-unit.target: The value of this field can be one of the below:

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: None

trans-unit.source: InProgress
trans-unit.target: InProgress

trans-unit.source: Completed
trans-unit.target: Completed

trans-unit.source: CompletedWithWarnings
trans-unit.target: CompletedWithWarnings

trans-unit.source: CompletedWithErrors
trans-unit.target: CompletedWithErrors

trans-unit.source: InternalError
trans-unit.target: InternalError

trans-unit.source: ManifestCorrupted
trans-unit.target: ManifestCorrupted

trans-unit.source: ManifestNameInvalid
trans-unit.target: ManifestNameInvalid

trans-unit.source: ManifestNameTooLong
trans-unit.target: ManifestNameTooLong

trans-unit.source: ManifestNotFound
trans-unit.target: ManifestNotFound

trans-unit.source: ManifestAccessDenied
trans-unit.target: ManifestAccessDenied

trans-unit.source: ManifestFormatInvalid
trans-unit.target: ManifestFormatInvalid

trans-unit.source: ReadManifestFailed
trans-unit.target: ReadManifestFailed

trans-unit.source: ManifestDriveIdMismatch
trans-unit.target: ManifestDriveIdMismatch

trans-unit.source: BlobListFormatInvalid
trans-unit.target: BlobListFormatInvalid

trans-unit.source: DiskNotFound
trans-unit.target: DiskNotFound

trans-unit.source: VolumeNotNtfs
trans-unit.target: VolumeNotNtfs

trans-unit.source: DiskOperationFailed
trans-unit.target: DiskOperationFailed

trans-unit.source: BitLockerNotActivated
trans-unit.target: BitLockerNotActivated

trans-unit.source: BitLockerProtectorNotFound
trans-unit.target: BitLockerProtectorNotFound

trans-unit.source: BitLockerKeyInvalid
trans-unit.target: BitLockerKeyInvalid

trans-unit.source: BitLockerUnlockVolumeFailed
trans-unit.target: BitLockerUnlockVolumeFailed

trans-unit.source: BitLockerFailed
trans-unit.target: BitLockerFailed

trans-unit.source: Integer
trans-unit.target: Integer

trans-unit.source: Percentage completed for the drive.
trans-unit.target: Percentage completed for the drive.

trans-unit.source: This value is applicable only in the <languageKeyword>Transferring</languageKeyword> and <languageKeyword>Completed</languageKeyword> drive states.
trans-unit.target: This value is applicable only in the <languageKeyword>Transferring</languageKeyword> and <languageKeyword>Completed</languageKeyword> drive states.

trans-unit.source: String
trans-unit.target: String

trans-unit.source: A URI that points to the blob containing the verbose log for the data transfer operation.
trans-unit.target: A URI that points to the blob containing the verbose log for the data transfer operation.

trans-unit.source: The blob will be stored in the container specified in the <languageKeyword>ImportExportStatesPath</languageKeyword> element.
trans-unit.target: The blob will be stored in the container specified in the <languageKeyword>ImportExportStatesPath</languageKeyword> element.

trans-unit.source: This element is included in the response only if verbose logging has been enabled.
trans-unit.target: This element is included in the response only if verbose logging has been enabled.

trans-unit.source: String
trans-unit.target: String

trans-unit.source: A URI that points to the blob containing the error log for the data transfer operation.
trans-unit.target: A URI that points to the blob containing the error log for the data transfer operation.

trans-unit.source: The blob will be stored in the container specified in the <languageKeyword>ImportExportStatesPath</languageKeyword> element.
trans-unit.target: The blob will be stored in the container specified in the <languageKeyword>ImportExportStatesPath</languageKeyword> element.

trans-unit.source: String
trans-unit.target: String

trans-unit.source: A URI that points to the blob containing the drive manifest file.
trans-unit.target: A URI that points to the blob containing the drive manifest file.

trans-unit.source: This property is included in the response only if the <languageKeyword>BackupDriveManifest</languageKeyword> property has been set to true by a <languageKeyword>Put Job</languageKeyword> or <languageKeyword>Update Job Properties</languageKeyword> request.
trans-unit.target: This property is included in the response only if the <languageKeyword>BackupDriveManifest</languageKeyword> property has been set to true by a <languageKeyword>Put Job</languageKeyword> or <languageKeyword>Update Job Properties</languageKeyword> request.

trans-unit.source: property
trans-unit.target: property

trans-unit.source: A property containing information about the blobs to be exported for an export job.
trans-unit.target: A property containing information about the blobs to be exported for an export job.

trans-unit.source: This property is included for export jobs only.
trans-unit.target: This property is included for export jobs only.

trans-unit.source: property
trans-unit.target: property

trans-unit.source: The list of the blobs to be exported.
trans-unit.target: The list of the blobs to be exported.

trans-unit.source: String
trans-unit.target: String

trans-unit.source: The relative URI to the blob, beginning with the container name.
trans-unit.target: The relative URI to the blob, beginning with the container name.

trans-unit.source: If the blob is in root container, the container is designated as <codeInline>$root</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: If the blob is in root container, the container is designated as <codeInline>$root</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: String
trans-unit.target: String

trans-unit.source: A blob path prefix that selects all blobs whose relative path begins with the prefix.
trans-unit.target: A blob path prefix that selects all blobs whose relative path begins with the prefix.

trans-unit.source: Note that the prefix always starts with a forward slash "/", followed by the container name.
trans-unit.target: Note that the prefix always starts with a forward slash "/", followed by the container name.

trans-unit.source: If the container is the root container, <codeInline>$root</codeInline> must be explicitly included.
trans-unit.target: If the container is the root container, <codeInline>$root</codeInline> must be explicitly included.

trans-unit.source: String
trans-unit.target: String

trans-unit.source: The relative URI to the blob that contains the list of blob paths or blob path prefixes as defined in the <link xlink:href="2f703ff1-d52b-43bd-81ec-90350a39e2af" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Put Job</link> operation, beginning with the container name.
trans-unit.target: The relative URI to the blob that contains the list of blob paths or blob path prefixes as defined in the <link xlink:href="2f703ff1-d52b-43bd-81ec-90350a39e2af" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Put Job</link> operation, beginning with the container name.

trans-unit.source: If the blob is in root container, <codeInline>$root</codeInline> must be explicitly included.
trans-unit.target: If the blob is in root container, <codeInline>$root</codeInline> must be explicitly included.

trans-unit.source: If the request fails, the response body contains the following error message:
trans-unit.target: If the request fails, the response body contains the following error message:

trans-unit.source: Element
trans-unit.target: Element

trans-unit.source: Type
trans-unit.target: Type

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: String
trans-unit.target: String

trans-unit.source: The standard HTTP status code returned when the request fails.
trans-unit.target: The standard HTTP status code returned when the request fails.

trans-unit.source: String
trans-unit.target: String

trans-unit.source: A human-readable description of the error.
trans-unit.target: A human-readable description of the error.

trans-unit.source: String
trans-unit.target: String

trans-unit.source: A predefined error code, if applicable.
trans-unit.target: A predefined error code, if applicable.

trans-unit.source: String
trans-unit.target: String

trans-unit.source: Additional information provided to diagnose the error.
trans-unit.target: Additional information provided to diagnose the error.

trans-unit.source: Sample Request and Response
trans-unit.target: Sample Request and Response

trans-unit.source: The following shows a sample request and response for the <languageKeyword>Get Job</languageKeyword> operation.
trans-unit.target: The following shows a sample request and response for the <languageKeyword>Get Job</languageKeyword> operation.

trans-unit.source: Request
trans-unit.target: Request

trans-unit.source: Response
trans-unit.target: Response

trans-unit.source: Remarks
trans-unit.target: Remarks

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Get Job</languageKeyword> operation returns the overall status of a job, including the status of the job and of each drive comprising the job.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Get Job</languageKeyword> operation returns the overall status of a job, including the status of the job and of each drive comprising the job.

trans-unit.source: All properties noted as optional in the request body of the <link xlink:href="2f703ff1-d52b-43bd-81ec-90350a39e2af" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Put Job</link> operation will be returned by the <languageKeyword>Get Job</languageKeyword> operation only if they have been specified as part of the <languageKeyword>Put Job</languageKeyword> request.
trans-unit.target: All properties noted as optional in the request body of the <link xlink:href="2f703ff1-d52b-43bd-81ec-90350a39e2af" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Put Job</link> operation will be returned by the <languageKeyword>Get Job</languageKeyword> operation only if they have been specified as part of the <languageKeyword>Put Job</languageKeyword> request.

trans-unit.source: The response for the <languageKeyword>Get Job</languageKeyword> operation includes basic information such as job name, storage account name, type, description, and job state.
trans-unit.target: The response for the <languageKeyword>Get Job</languageKeyword> operation includes basic information such as job name, storage account name, type, description, and job state.

trans-unit.source: In addition, depending on the type and state of the job, the response may also include other information, such as shipping and return information for drives and BitLocker keys for export jobs.
trans-unit.target: In addition, depending on the type and state of the job, the response may also include other information, such as shipping and return information for drives and BitLocker keys for export jobs.

trans-unit.source: The verbose log is a blob that contains the complete copy log for a drive.
trans-unit.target: The verbose log is a blob that contains the complete copy log for a drive.

trans-unit.source: It can be used to determine the copy status of each file on a drive and to view any warnings or errors that were logged during the copy operation.
trans-unit.target: It can be used to determine the copy status of each file on a drive and to view any warnings or errors that were logged during the copy operation.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="38cc16bd-ad55-4625-9a85-e1726c35fd1b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Import/Export Service Log File Format</link> for its format.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="38cc16bd-ad55-4625-9a85-e1726c35fd1b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Import/Export Service Log File Format</link> for its format.

trans-unit.source: By default, the verbose log is not generated.
trans-unit.target: By default, the verbose log is not generated.

trans-unit.source: To enable it, set <languageKeyword>EnableVerboseLog</languageKeyword> to <languageKeyword>true</languageKeyword> in a call to <languageKeyword>Put Job</languageKeyword> or <link xlink:href="6f83d480-c09e-4e3b-b096-46e140e8c93d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Update Job Properties</link>.
trans-unit.target: To enable it, set <languageKeyword>EnableVerboseLog</languageKeyword> to <languageKeyword>true</languageKeyword> in a call to <languageKeyword>Put Job</languageKeyword> or <link xlink:href="6f83d480-c09e-4e3b-b096-46e140e8c93d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Update Job Properties</link>.

trans-unit.source: The error log is a subset of the verbose log.
trans-unit.target: The error log is a subset of the verbose log.

trans-unit.source: It contains only warning and error entries.
trans-unit.target: It contains only warning and error entries.

trans-unit.source: The error log is always enabled.
trans-unit.target: The error log is always enabled.

trans-unit.source: Both the error logs and verbose logs (if enabled) are stored in the container specified by the <languageKeyword>ImportExportStatesPath</languageKeyword> element.
trans-unit.target: Both the error logs and verbose logs (if enabled) are stored in the container specified by the <languageKeyword>ImportExportStatesPath</languageKeyword> element.

trans-unit.source: If no container is specified, the logs are stored in a default container named <newTerm>waimportexport</newTerm>.
trans-unit.target: If no container is specified, the logs are stored in a default container named <newTerm>waimportexport</newTerm>.

trans-unit.source: Logs are stored as block blobs with the following naming convention: <codeInline>waies/jobname_driveid_timestamp_logtype.xml</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: Logs are stored as block blobs with the following naming convention: <codeInline>waies/jobname_driveid_timestamp_logtype.xml</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: You can specify conditional headers to retrieve a job only when certain conditions are met.
trans-unit.target: You can specify conditional headers to retrieve a job only when certain conditions are met.

trans-unit.source: When specifying conditional headers, keep in mind the following:
trans-unit.target: When specifying conditional headers, keep in mind the following:

trans-unit.source: If a request specifies both the <parameterReference>If-None-Match</parameterReference> and <parameterReference>If-Modified-Since</parameterReference> headers, the request is evaluated based on the criteria specified in <parameterReference>If-None-Match</parameterReference>.
trans-unit.target: If a request specifies both the <parameterReference>If-None-Match</parameterReference> and <parameterReference>If-Modified-Since</parameterReference> headers, the request is evaluated based on the criteria specified in <parameterReference>If-None-Match</parameterReference>.

trans-unit.source: If a request specifies both the <parameterReference>If-Match</parameterReference> and <parameterReference>If-Unmodified-Since</parameterReference> headers, the request is evaluated based on the criteria specified in <parameterReference>If-Match</parameterReference>.
trans-unit.target: If a request specifies both the <parameterReference>If-Match</parameterReference> and <parameterReference>If-Unmodified-Since</parameterReference> headers, the request is evaluated based on the criteria specified in <parameterReference>If-Match</parameterReference>.

trans-unit.source: With the exception of the two combinations of conditional headers listed above, a request may specify only a single conditional header.
trans-unit.target: With the exception of the two combinations of conditional headers listed above, a request may specify only a single conditional header.

trans-unit.source: Specifying more than one conditional header results in status code 400 (<languageKeyword>Bad Request</languageKeyword>).
trans-unit.target: Specifying more than one conditional header results in status code 400 (<languageKeyword>Bad Request</languageKeyword>).

trans-unit.source: The following table indicates the response codes returned for an unmet condition for each conditional header:
trans-unit.target: The following table indicates the response codes returned for an unmet condition for each conditional header:

trans-unit.source: Conditional header
trans-unit.target: Conditional header

trans-unit.source: Response code if condition has not been met
trans-unit.target: Response code if condition has not been met

trans-unit.source: Precondition Failed (412)
trans-unit.target: Precondition Failed (412)

trans-unit.source: Precondition Failed (412)
trans-unit.target: Precondition Failed (412)

trans-unit.source: Precondition Failed (412)
trans-unit.target: Precondition Failed (412)

trans-unit.source: Precondition Failed (412)
trans-unit.target: Precondition Failed (412)
